Reviews.Content: Big Fun in Little Tulamben       Big fun with Dive Guide Ari (the guy with the big Bali Bro smile)
Reviews.Author: ohByJingo

Reviews.Content: Fantastic Place We stayed at the Tulamben wreck Divers for 4 nights in their new ocean front villas, they are extremelly well appointed with ocean views, outside bathrooms, dvd's and the friendliest staff anywhere, nothing is to much trouble, they make you feel like you are part of a their community. the gardens and infinity pool are beauitiful. The Australian owner puts on a get together feast every 3 nights for everyone, great to meet other travelers and divers. Breakfast is also included and served in a lovely outdoors cafe under the villas overlooking the ocean. A bike or car is arranged for travel to the owners dive shop just down the road.This place is in an upper class compared to other resorts in Tulamben. I would highly recomend as been able to come up to everyones standards. A great trip and fantastic diving, very proffesional and helpful.
Reviews.Author: australiajimmy
